subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Of all the Cavaliers players who have come and gone in the organization’s 37-year history and for all the vitality LeBron James has brought, Bingo Smith remains the Cavaliers’ soul.
snippet: Of all the Cavaliers players who have come and gone in the organization’s 37-year history and for all the vitality LeBron James has brought, Bingo Smith remains the Cavaliers’ soul.
